add_claims.description: Title of a form where claims can be added.

add_claims_to.description: Title of a form where claims can be added to a specific entity.

add_claims_to_many.description: Title of a form where claims can be added to multiple entities.

search_ids.description: Title of a list where external ids can be searched.

no_claims.description: Message seen in items and lexemes that have no claims yet.

placeholder_example_text.description: Placeholder of a textfield that shows an example text that can be entered.

example.example: On the Origin of Species by Means of Natural Selection

placeholder_example_amount.description: Placeholder of a textfield that shows an example number that be entered.

no_ids_for_following_type.message: Er zijn geen bekende id-eigenschappen voor de volgende typen:
no_ids_for_following_type.description: Introduces a list of classes that don't have associated external id properties.

placeholder_example_date.description: Placeholder of a textfield that shows an example number that be entered.

amount.description: Label of a field where a user is supposed to enter an numerical amount.

unit.description: Label of a field where a user is supposed to enter a unit for an numerical amount.

placeholder_example_unit.description: Placeholder of a textfield that shows an example unit that can be entered.

searching_ids.description: Message shown when querying ids that are expected from a specific entity.

no_language_selected.description: The option label of a select where currently no language is selected.

preferred_languages.description: Label seen above a list of languages known to be preferred by the user.

other_languages.description: Label seen above a list of languages not known to be preferred by the user.

match_via_sitelink.description: Header of a section that allows matching a url to a wikibase entity via sitelink.

match_via_external_id.description: Header of a section that allows matching a url to a wikibase entity via an external id.

match_via_url.description: Header of a section that allows matching a url to a wikibase entity.

edit_button.description: Label of a button that allows editing something.

edit_descriptions.description: Title of a form where descriptions can be changed.

set_lemma.description: Label of an input field where a lemma can be added.

edit_lemmas.description: Title of a form where lemmas of a lexeme can be changed.

edit_lemma.description: Label of a text field where a lemma can be changed,

set_alias.description: Title of an edit that sets an alias.

set_label_or_alias.description: Title of an edit that sets an label or an alias.

set_description.description: Title of an edit that sets a description.

set_sitelink.description: Title of an edit that sets a sitelink.

dismiss_action.description: Label of a button that dismisses a message.

search_item_placeholder.message: Zoek items op label of alias.
search_item_placeholder.description: Placeholder of a field that searches for wikibase items.

search_lexeme_placeholder.message: Zoek lexemen op lemma of vorm.
search_lexeme_placeholder.description: Placeholder of a field that searches for wikibase lexemes.

search_sense_placeholder.message: Zoek betekenissen van lexemen op lemma.
search_sense_placeholder.description: Placeholder of a field that searches for wikibase senses.

search_property_placeholder.message: Zoek eigenschappen op label of alias.
search_property_placeholder.description: Placeholder of a field that searches for wikibase senses.

search_unit_placeholder.message: Zoek eenheid op label of alias.
search_unit_placeholder.description: Placeholder of a field that searches for items that represent a unit like kilometers or Yen.

load_autodesc.description: Message that informs the user that an automatic description is in the state of being loaded.

match_title.description: Title of an entity match form.

create_new_entity.description: Label of an option that will create a new entity.

new_entity.description: Label of a selected option that will create a new entity.

disambiguation_title.description: Title of the sidebar when it shows disambiguation screen.

send_to_instance.description: Title of a button that sends claims to a particular wikibase instance.

other_matches_title.description: Title for a section that contains contextual matches for a particular website.

wb_set_alias.description: Name of the command that sets aliases of the wikibase api.

ambiguous_url_intro.message: Deze url is aan meerdere Wikibase-entiteiten gekoppeld. Kies de gewenste entiteit.
ambiguous_url_intro.description: Message shown when a url was matched to multiple entitis over a selection.

media_info.description: Label of a link showing more information about a file.

external_id.description: Heading for a section containing a single external id.

external_ids.description: Heading for a section containing external ids.

quick_link.description: Heading for a section containing a single quick link.

quick_links.description: Heading for a section containing quick links.

link.description: Heading for a section containing a single link.

links.description: Heading for a section containing links.

reference.description: Heading for a section containing a single reference.

references.description: Heading for a section containing references.

month_1.description: The name of the first month.

month_2.description: The name of the second month.

month_3.description: The name of the third month.

month_4.description: The name of the fourth month.

month_5.description: The name of the fifth month.

month_6.description: The name of the sixth month.

month_7.description: The name of the seventh month.

month_8.description: The name of the eighth month.

month_9.description: The name of the ninth month.

month_10.description: The name of the tenth month.

month_11.description: The name of the eleventh month.

month_12.description: The name of the twelfth month.

time_precision_day.description: Option stating that a date statment has the precision of a day.

time_precision_month.description: Option stating that a date statment has the precision of a month.

time_precision_year.description: Option stating that a date statment has the precision of a year.

gloss_style_format.description: Affixes around a gloss style. Can be used for parenthesis, etc.

gloss_gender_format.description: Affixes around a gloss gender. Can be used for parenthesis, etc.

gloss_item_format.description: Affixes around a item link under a gloss.
